text:
HubSpot SEO Recommendations is suggesting adding lazy loading to images which are set as section backgrounds in the vanilla/non-custom section background settings in the page editor.
Since this is not an option which is currently provided in the page editor experience for section backgrounds is there a way to add this attribute?
Adding this via custom JavaScript is going to occur after it's already been loaded via HubSpot so anything custom is only going to delay the page further.
--
Additionally, I see this as <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Lazy-Loading-for-Background-photos-on-a-Section/m-p/904845/highlight/true?profile.language=pt-br|a recent community question>. Is this something HubSpot has any plans to add to the page editor settings?
